form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screeneded by NARA, 5/5/2023, Screeneded by NARA, 5/5/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/5/2023 BRUCE E. W. BOWMAN Attorney at Law, A Professional Law Corporation 2500 Wilshire Boulevard, Suite PH-D Los Angeles, California 90057 Telephone: (213) 384-6828 March 14, 1988 U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service 99 Office of the Immigration Judge 880 Front Street, Room 5N44 San Diego, CA 92188 RE: Prudencio DE LEON-Torres A: 28 754 751 Dear Immigration Judge, The purpose of this letter is to convey to you the attached Change of Venue Motion and Political Asylum Application. Attached to this letter, please find the following: G-28, Notice of Entry of Appearance as Attorney, Change of Venue Motion, Change of Venue Amendment, List of Prospective Witnesses, Affidavit of Respondent, Respondent's Points and Authorities, I-589, Asylum Application Declaration of Respondent, Declaration of Translator, G-325A, Biographic Information, FD-258, Fingerprint Chart, Exhibits: Country Reports on Human Rights Practices for 1985, Department of State 1986, United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees 1981, Proof of Service. The following information is provided for your convenience: Immigration Judge: unknown A#: 28 754 751 Date of next hearing: April 8. 1988
